immunedeconv2 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • immunedeconv2_vignette

Reference

Main package methods

Main methods to build signature matrices and deconvolute cell fractions.

deconvolution_methods

List of supported immune deconvolution methods

build_model()

Building the signature matrix

deconvolute()

Deconvolution

Signature matrix creation methods

Direct access to the individual signature matrix creation methods.

build_model_momf()

Calculates the signature model with bisque

build_model_dwls()

Signature matrix creation with DWLS using genes identified by DEAnalysisMAST()

build_model_scaden()

Builds Scaden Model from scRNA data

build_model_bisque()

Calculates the signature model with bisque

build_model_cibersortx()

Signature matrix creation with CibersortX

Deconvolution methods

Direct access to the individual deconvolution methods to access special features that are not available through deconvolute.

deconvolute_momf()

Deconvolution Analysis using MOMF (via Nonnegative Factorization)

deconvolute_dwls()

Calculates the decomposition using the dwls algorithm

deconvolute_scaden()

Performs deconvolution

deconvolute_bisque()

Calculates the decomposition using the bisque algorithm

deconvolute_cibersortx()

Deconvolute with CibersortX

Datasets

List of datasets provided by the package.

bulk

Example RNA-seq dataset from Hoek et al.

bulk_small

Small example RNA-seq dataset from Hoek et al.

cell_type_annotations

Cell type annotations for the example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

cell_type_annotations_small

Cell type annotations for the small example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

single_cell_data

Example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

single_cell_data_small

Small example sigle-cell RNA-seq dataset from Maynard et al.

Helper

Helper functions to extract repeating checks or work with non-R related tasks like Python or Docker.

init_python()

Initiates python environment

install_scaden()

Install Scaden

python_available()

Checks if python is available in environment

set_python()

Defines python path.

set_cibersortx_credentials()

Setting the CibersortX Credentials

docker_available()

Docker availability check

docker_connectable()

Docker connectability check

verbose_wrapper()

A wrapper function whether to suppress messages

Scaden

Functions and objects related to the Scaden deconvolution_methods.

scaden_checkload()

Checks if scaden is installed.

scaden_predict()

Predict cell proportions

scaden_process()

Pre-processes training data

scaden_simulate()

Simulates training data from scRNA data

scaden_simulate_example()

Simulates example Data provided by Scaden

scaden_train()

Trains a Scaden model

Anndata

Functions related to anndata.

anndata_check_load()

Checks if anndata package is loaded

build_anndata()

Create anndata object from single cell expression matrix, cell type labels and gene symbols

read_anndata()

Read anndata object (.h5ad format)

write_anndata()

Write anndata object (.h5ad format)

Data conversion

Functions for data conversion.

get_single_cell_expression_set()

Generating a single cell expression set

anndata_to_singlecellexperiment()

Convert AnnData to SingleCellExperiment

singlecellexperiment_to_anndata()

Convert SingleCellExperiment to AnnData object

matrix_to_singlecellexperiment()

Convert count matrix to SingleCellExperiment

singlecellexperiment_to_matrix()

Convert SingleCellExperiment to Matrix + annotation vector for celltypes

Contents
